channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Deep potholes and trench in middle of carriageway near, 4th February
item.description:
Gretton Road, towards Gotherington after Pardon Hill Farm before railway bridge. Deep potholes and deep trench in the middle of carriageway caused by flooding/standing water. Carriageway is in need of urgent repair as it very dangerous, especially in the dark and has blown a true. It has been reported a number of times 3rd Nov 2024 (FixMyStreet ref: 6690502); 15th Dec 2024 (FixMyStreet ref: 6864672) and 25th Jan 2025 (FixMyStreet ref: 7031785).
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gretton Road, Prescott, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog mess still not cleaned up after being reported, 4th February
item.description:
The dog mess reported some time ago on Everest Rd opposite House No 5, on the pavement, has still not been removed. It has now been stepped in and will be on someone's shoes and have been taken into their house/car.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2a, Everest Road, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog mess yet again Tensing Rd, 4th February
item.description:
Dog mess outside 2nd house on left as you come out of the alleyway between Hilary Road onto Tensing Road. Just before the corner of the junction with Southfield Close
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Tensing Road, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A second 50mph sign has been pulled from the ground and left beside the road -, 4th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Colesbourne, Cotswold
